snippet.title: Kirby Battle Blitz: Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
It's ready! The Battle Blitz of a Century has ARRIVED!

After a hard year of development, we've finally got something to show for it. And it's BIG!

Download the game here:
https://gamejolt.com/games/KBB/578480

Join the discord:
discord.gg/aR3qAkB

* Up to 13-15 playable characters! Clash with foes as you see them in their original animations! Aege vs Saito, Jodie vs Clutch, Glitch vs. Vivienne!
* Learn satisfying combos with this wacky 9 button fighter! Yeah, that ain't a typo!
* Easy to pick up! Most complex input is a Quarter Circle motion! Down, then Forward, then an attack button!
* Don't like 1v1's? That's ok! You can 1v2, 2v4, 4v4! Whatever you want! You can even have 4 characters on screen at the SAME TIME! STEAM ROLL through Arcade mode with your gang of gumballs! The definition of PURE CHAOS!
* Experience mini-games, intimidating mini-bosses, and terrifying boss fights! Featuring A training dummy, Duckhunt and Break the targets by Stupa, Stupa again, and Althegod!
* You can even play online! Fight some fellas in the discord server! You can even PLAY ARCADE MODE ONLINE!
* Find any bugs? Think a character needs some tuning? Want more characters, bosses, and mini-games? All three questions will be quenched! Expect patches! Be sure to JOIN THE DISCORD SERVER to be notified of every update! As well as see detailed patch notes!
* Due to the ikemen/mugen engine, you could even add your OWN characters if you wish! Make your own meme/dream roster! Wont work online though lmao
* Be warned, there's a few copyrighted songs within' this game. So if you plan on recording your session, be careful!
* THIS PROJECT WAS BUILT OFF OF PASSION AND IN NO WAY IS MADE FOR MONITARY GAIN. THE GAME IS FREE, AND ALL MADE WITHIN' OUR FREE TIME.

ANIMATION CREDITS FOR THE TRAILER IN ORDER
MCQSquare - https://www.youtube.com/user/quadrila...​
JalenBrah - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUMX...​
xkareloadedx - https://www.youtube.com/user/xkareloa...​


We hope to see ya Blitzing on the battle field! Thanks so much for reading!
And Thank you so much xXZackAttack27Xx.
